en_title: LC: Secretary for Justice's speech to move motion to amend Clause 9 of Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015
zh_title: 立法會︰律政司司長動議修正《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》第九條發言全文

en: Following is the translation of a speech by the Secretary for Justice, Mr Rimsky Yuen, SC, in moving a motion on Committee Stage Amendment to amend Clause 9 of the Arbitration (Amendment) Bill 2015 today (July 9):
I move the amendment to the clause read out just now. The amendment to that clause is set out in the paper distributed to Members.

As the State of Palestine became a party to the New York Convention on April 2, 2015, we propose to add "State of Palestine" to the Schedule to the Arbitration (Parties to New York Convention) Order so as to update the list of parties to the New York Convention.
The Bills Committee has noted the above amendment. I urge Members to support the amendment. Thank you, Acting Chairman.
zh: 以下是律政司司長袁國強資深大律師今日（七月九日）在《2015年仲裁（修訂）條例草案》全體委員會審議階段動議修正《條例草案》第九條的發言全文︰
我動議修正剛讀出的條文。修正案的內容已載列於分發給各位議員的文件。
因應「巴勒斯坦國」於二○一五年四月二日加入成為《紐約公約》的締約方，我們建議修改《仲裁（紐約公約締約方）令》的附表，以更新《仲裁條例》下《紐約公約》的締約方名單。
法案委員會已察悉上述修正案。我懇請各委員通過該修正案。多謝代主席。
